Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory301.png'}
{1: 'DialogEnable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'Noctis slowly opens his eyes. He gets really confused by the sky that seems extremely close, and decides to just space out.'}
{3: 'Noctis hears a voice over his stomach. He feels even more confused, but suddenly remembers why he ended up lying here.'}

{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: "You're quite tough. No. 21's full strength only knocked you off for 3 minutes... Well, if you were on the battlefield, 3 minutes are more than enough to kill you or turn you into Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Noctis' hands and feet are tightly tied together, so he can only wriggle around, trying to shake off the Construct standing on his belly."}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: "I'm standing on a caterpillar!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Despite Noctis' desperate struggles, No. 21 just spreads her arms out and maintains perfect balance."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I ain't no caterpillar! At least a centipede!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Fuming with anger, Noctis curls his legs to make a "kip-up" move in Kowloong martial arts using his core strength, bringing himself back on his feet.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Finally thrown off, No. 21 does a somersault in the air and lands firmly on the ground.'}

{3: 'Noctis exerts all his strength to break the steel rope that ties up his arms. He quickly strikes a fighting stance against Vera and No. 21, albeit his still tied-up feet make him look more funny than fierce.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Gee, the rope is used by the Support Force to tie up large cargo... Can he even break that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: '****! That thing will never hold me back...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It was supposed to be a 1-on-1! I would never lose to you if you didn't cheat!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Still looking for excuses... Noctis is such a "sore loser."', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Shut up!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Smiling, Vera walks to No. 21 and pats her on the head.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'As a member of mine, No. 21 is considered my "weapon."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Just like this katana, I was just using an available weapon against you. I think that makes perfect sense.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis opens his mouth but cannot find a word. He just feels something is not quite right.'}
{2: 'No. 21', 3: 'Noctis is a fool indeed...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Besides, nobody would fight with dignity in a real battle... How did you even survive until now in the Purifying Force?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Purifying Force members often have to face the most desperate, vicious enemies in their missions.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Tsk, I know what you mean...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Unlike the mindless Corrupted who will only charge directly at their targets, the Purifying Force would do anything to survive, no matter how despicable.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'The victory was mine... But if you are too much of a loser to take it, you are always welcome to challenge me again.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With his hands on the hips, Noctis lets out a sigh and punches the steel rope binding his feet loose. No. 21 and her Co-Bot immediately move to Vera.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Whatever... I'll listen to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "But don't get me wrong. I didn't lose to you... It's just that...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis looks at his robotic arm. The damage marks on it are still clearly visible.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Unlike someone, I made the promise, and I'll stick to it no matter what.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera returns her katana to its sheath. She smiles and gestures to No. 21 so that she can relax.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Well, as the captain of Cerberus, I'd like to give you a piece of advice.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You want to go back to the Purifying Force to investigate the murder of its ex-captain, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'How did you know...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Because I have a brain and eyes... And I also know how to use my "weapons."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "You seem like the type easily influenced by anger. It's your weakness... But it can also become your strength.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "While you are in Cerberus, find out the real target that you should unleash your anger on... That way, maybe you'll get one step closer to the truth you want.", 4: '1'}
{3: "As Vera is about to leave, she pats on No. 21's back, signaling her to follow. Left alone, Noctis is still pondering Vera's words."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Cerberus... From evil-hunting hounds to puppy watchdogs, huh?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Noctis looks at the Cerberus emblem on his new coating. It is a symbol of the hellhound. Despite its three ferocious heads, to most people's surprise, it is a guardian."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'What are you still doing there?! Hurry!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis scratches his head and quickly follows along.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'You can drive, right? We need to drive to the shuttle pad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hearing the voice calling him from afar, Noctis sneers and points at his nose.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Are you serious? There\'s no such thing as "cannot" in my dictionary. I\'m a fantastic driver!', 4: '1'}
